definitions.definition: The world of the dead , located underneath the world of the living; the afterlife .
examples: In Hindu scriptures, the four-eyed dogs Śārvara and Śyāma guard the underworld's entrance.

definitions.definition: That part of society that is engaged in crime or vice , and particularly those involved in organized crime .
examples: A disproportionate amount of local politicians have connections to the underworld .

definitions.definition: The portion of a game that is set below ground.

main_definition: ( religion or mythology ) The world of the dead , located underneath the world of the living; the afterlife .
secondary_definitions: That part of society that is engaged in crime or vice , and particularly those involved in organized crime .
( video games ) The portion of a game that is set below ground.
